decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures with evasive abilities to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also includes disruptive spells and removal to control the board and protect its own creatures. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor help to close out games. The mana base is optimized to ensure a smooth curve and consistent access to both black and blue mana sources. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and efficient aggro strategy while maintaining a level of control.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creatures and removal spells to control the board and put pressure on the opponent. With a mix of powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Glissa Sunslayer, alongside efficient removal spells like Go for the Throat, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory. The deck also includes some graveyard recursion with cards like Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal and Mosswood Dreadknight to ensure a steady stream of threats. With a solid mana base and a mix of creatures and removal, this deck aims to win the game through aggression and control.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor to quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Spyglass Siren and Faerie Mastermind to control the board. With removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, as well as disruptive spells like Make Disappear, the deck aims to keep the opponent on the back foot while pushing for lethal damage. The mana base includes a mix of dual lands and utility lands to ensure smooth mana production for the deck's powerful threats.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's resources through a combination of counterspells, removal, and board wipes. It aims to maintain board control while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Deadly Cover-Up and Blot Out. The deck also has a strong late-game with cards like The Celestus and White Sun's Twilight to generate card advantage and outvalue the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the deck's control elements and ensure consistent access to the necessary colors of mana.

This deck focuses on utilizing various reanimation spells and abilities to bring powerful creatures back from the graveyard, often comboing off to generate value and overwhelm opponents. The deck includes cards that facilitate graveyard interactions, removal spells to control the board, and lands that support the color requirements of the deck. The goal is to quickly assemble the necessary pieces to execute the reanimation combo and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and synergies.
